release_notes:
New Features

  • Added calendar display to the left sidebar for improved date navigation and event visibility

Previous Release (1.2.0)

New Features

  • Added Dashboard room management:
    • Reorder entities and add/remove them directly from the dashboard
    • Press and hold to enter editing mode
    • Click anywhere to disable editing mode
  • Added release notes modal to dashboard for current release information
  • Various styling improvements throughout the application

Notes

  • Room management (creation, deletion and ordering) remains in settings
  • Entity management remains available in settings
